addr: 1638 North Cahuenga Boulevard Los Angeles, CA 90028
title: Sheer: A Private Lingerie Party
desc: Come ring in the holidays with an evening of culinary cocktails and semi-clothed dancing at Hollywood's most glamorous club.? This is a private party with limited tickets available for purchase.? Complimentary sexy boudoir style photos will be taken throughout the night by our renowned photographer and will be available for download after the event. Open Bar // Special Guest DJ Ladies: Lingerie Only // Gentlemen: Upscale Attire FAQs Are there ID requirements or an age limit to enter the event? Grandpa Johnson's Cocktail Club is 21+.? You must present valid ID at the door.? What are my transport/parking options getting to the event? Grandpa Johnson's Cocktail Club has valet parking and there are additional parking lots in the area.? What can/can't I bring to the event? Please bring yourself and a guest!? Attire for ladies is lingerie only.? Gentlemen please wear upscale attire. There are no baseball caps, tennis shoes, or sandals allowed.? Where can I contact the organizer with any questions? You may contact us at RSVP@sheerla.com.? Is my registration/ticket transferrable? Tickets are not transferrable and there are no refunds for ticket purchases.
